quests.title: Piper At The Gates of Dawn
quests.description: Old Floyd Pinkus is looking for his bike, who one Piper borrowed.

quests.title: Axes Bold as Love
quests.description: Jimothy needs you to take his axe two towns over to get it sharpened professionally.  Also, kill wolves.
objectives: Deliver Jimothy's Axe to New Hamp Shire
Infiltrate the People for the Eulogical Training of Animalfolk

quests.title: Fire the Bass
quests.description: Epicodus can't hear his music; use magic to increase the bass.
